p: Infections of other enveloped RNA viruses that buds in similar mechanisms may also be inhibited by STIM1 and ORAI1 inhibitors. Indeed, SOC channel antagonists significantly reduced DENV yield [ 38]. When the human hepatic HepG2 and Huh-7 cells are infected by DENV, STIM1 and ORAI1 were shown to be co-localized in infected cells, indicating activation of the SOC channel [ 38, 39]. Therefore, DENV infection alters cell Ca 2+ homeostasis possibly via promoting the interaction between STIM1 and ORAI1.
